Method Detail

trimRight

public static String trimRight(String rawData)
Performs a right trim operation on the input String. If the String may contain non-printable characters, and the String is to printed, it is also recommended that the getPrintableAscii method be performed first.

Parameters:
rawData -
Returns:
a right trimmed string

trimLeft

public static String trimLeft(String rawData)
Performs a right trim operation on the input String. If the String may contain non-printable characters, and the String is to printed, it is also recommended that the getPrintableAscii method be performed first.

Parameters:
rawData -
Returns:
a left trimmed string

rightTrim

public static String rightTrim(Object in,
                               int length)
Truncates a stringto the specified length. If the input is null, a zero length String is returned. The toString method is called on the object to get the String representation. Lengths must be non negative.

Parameters:
in -
length -
Returns:
